statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 5 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -3 \\ -20 \\ -14 \\ 23 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 5 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -5 \\ 4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -3 \\ -20 \\ -14 \\ 23 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
